metadata.title: CVE-2023-52744 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:RDMA/irdma: Fix potential NULL-ptr-dereferencein_dev_get() can return NULL which will cause a failure once idev isdereferenced in in_dev_for_each_ifa_rtnl(). This patch adds acheck for NULL value in idev beforehand.Found by Linux Verification Center (linuxtesting.org) with SVACE.

criterions.comment: linux-fips package in fips/xenial is affected and may need fixing.
